Name: Fork Truck Challenge
About the game: Forktruck Challenge is a game about moving cargo from point A to point B. Players test their accuracy skills to the limit by operating heavy lifting machinery. You gain points for successfully delivering cargo as fast as you can. Good luck with multiplayer heavy lifting.
